name: Nod Painter for Google Cardboard
description:
Add color to the world around you with just a simple nod of your head in this relaxing experience for Google Cardboard. Nod Painter allows you to modify your setting by shooting rainbow orbs from the top of your head and dying the objects they hit.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Nod your head up, then down and back up again to fire the color-modifying balls. Then aim your focus towards the objects you would like to hit.
- Reset the scene to a blank canvas by gazing at the “Reset” button and pressing your Cardboard trigger.

HIGHLIGHTS:
- No registration or account needed
- No links to social media
- No push notifications
